Text.Language: Lord God of hosts, who have set us in the inheritance of this ministry, who know the minds of men and examine hearts and reins, hear us according to the multitude of Your mercies, and cleanse us from every defilement of body and spirit; take away our sins like a cloud and our iniquities like darkness; fill us with Your power and the grace of Your only Son and the working of Your most-holy Spirit; make us sufficient that we may be ministers of Your New Covenant, so that we may be able, as befits Your holy name, to stand before You to perform the priestly ministry for your divine mysteries; and do not abandon us to participate in the sins of others, but rather wipe out our own; and grant to us, Lord, that we may do nothing wrong through error, but give us knowledge to choose those who are worthy and to present [them] to you;
